item.title: By: Mike P. Sinn
item.dc:creator: Mike P. Sinn
item.description: I see. Thanks for the clarification.

item.title: By: seahen
item.dc:creator: seahen
item.description: I mean labels applied by people who know the candidate's voting record. It's more useful to have a cluster label than a lengthy attribute vector.
item.content:encoded: I mean labels applied by people who know the candidate’s voting record. It’s more useful to have a cluster label than a lengthy attribute vector.

item.title: By: James Fuller
item.dc:creator: James Fuller
item.description: Using their record would be more rational. I can say I am a libertarian but really be a neocon.
item.content:encoded: Using their record would be more rational. I can say I am a libertarian but really be a neocon.

item.title: By: seahen
item.dc:creator: seahen
item.description: I find political labels useful. While the fundamental goal may be the same, knowing that someone is labeled a Libertarian warns me ahead of time that they and I have fundamental and practically irreconciliable disagreements about how to achieve that goal.
item.content:encoded: I find political labels useful. While the fundamental goal may be the same, knowing that someone is labeled a Libertarian warns me ahead of time that they and I have fundamental and practically irreconciliable disagreements about how to achieve that goal.

item.title: By: Bob Butterfield
item.dc:creator: Bob Butterfield
item.description:
thank you, Al!
I'm afraid I do not have the information that you require, but I would suggest asking on http://www.quora.com/
Maybe someone there can help. Good luck! :D

item.title: By: Al Tenner
item.dc:creator: Al Tenner
item.description: Love the way you get the point. No BS. Need some help. Need a list or direction to a website of the top 50-100 corpotate entities that receive tax subsidies, tax code preferences and direct dollars from the US Government.
item.content:encoded: Love the way you get the point. No BS. Need some help. Need a list or direction to a website of the top 50-100 corpotate entities that receive tax subsidies, tax code preferences and direct dollars from the US Government.
